name: Entity (itch) (Minty)
description:
Entity is a small, text and stat based game that falls into the sci-fi/horror genre. Most events and tests are randomized, creating various playthrough experiences that can range from straightforward and easy to immediately deadly. There are several endings based on your performance, and there are four playable characters to choose from with different starting stats. Save your crew, kill the aliens, and get the ship in working order to win!

Or, die horribly, heartbeat screaming in your ears as you suffocate alone in the dark of a vent.
